record.description: Co-operating with the government defense program, the University of Chicago has doubled the size of its rifle range and will offer an informal course in marksmanship to both men and women. Russell Wiles, course instructor, is giving some pointers to Dick Wallens, a freshman, and Milly Keippel a sophomore, as Gerrie Barlick looks on.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached caption and crop and paint marks on the surface.
